ernest
Class Ernest

java.lang.Object
  ernest.Ernest
All Implemented Interfaces:
IErnest
public class Ernest
extends java.lang.Object
implements IErnest

The main Ernest class used to create an Ernest agent in the environment.

Author:
ogeorgeon
